members.joinCircumstances: Forced to join temporarily after being captured with Luffy
Forced to join temporarily after being captured with Ace

keyMoments.title: Bluejam Pirates Ambush the Brothers
keyMoments.description: The Bluejam Pirates ambush and capture Sabo, Ace, and Luffy at Gray Terminal, revealing they were hired by Outlook III.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Bluejam Pirates' role as agents of the nobles and their willingness to harm children for profit.

keyMoments.title: Battle with the Three Brothers
keyMoments.description: The Bluejam Pirates fight and overpower the three brothers using firearms.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's ruthlessness and their advantage over the children.

keyMoments.title: Ace and Luffy Temporarily Join
keyMoments.description: Bluejam offers Ace and Luffy positions on his crew, which they accept, unaware they're being used in the Gray Terminal fire plot.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the crew manipulates the brothers into helping with the nobles' genocidal plan.

bases.description: The Bluejam Pirates' hideout in or near Gray Terminal
